title: Restaurant Reservation (Lite Agent)
description: AI agent uses business app integration to make restaurant reservations more efficiently

steps.content: Book a table for 4 at Giuseppe's tonight at 8 PM
Accessing restaurant booking platform...
Found Giuseppe's profile in OpenTable system
Checking real-time availability for party of 4...
OpenTable API: Available slots at 7:30 PM and 8:30 PM
Booking 8:30 PM slot (closest to requested time)
Reservation confirmed: Table for 4 at Giuseppe's, tonight 8:30 PM. Confirmation #RT-4589
‚úÖ Reserved! Giuseppe's tonight at 8:30 PM for 4 people. Confirmation: RT-4589. I booked 8:30 PM as it was the closest available time to your requested 8 PM.

title: Medical Appointment (Lite Agent)
description: AI agent integrates with clinic management system for faster appointment booking

steps.content: Schedule my annual checkup with Dr. Martinez for next week
Connecting to MedConnect patient portal...
Authenticating with patient ID: MW-7891
MedConnect API: Dr. Martinez available slots next week: Mon 2PM, Wed 10AM, Fri 3PM
Checking your calendar preferences...
Booking Wednesday 10 AM slot (matches your preferred morning appointments)
Appointment confirmed: Dr. Martinez, Wednesday Oct 25th, 10:00 AM. Pre-visit forms sent to email.
‚úÖ Appointment scheduled! Dr. Martinez - Wednesday, Oct 25th at 10 AM. Check your email for pre-visit forms. Reminder set for 24 hours before.

title: Flight Booking (Lite Agent)
description: AI agent uses travel booking APIs to search and book flights automatically

steps.content: Book a flight from NYC to LA, departing December 15th, returning December 22nd
Searching flight options via Expedia API...
Expedia API: Found 23 flight combinations NYC-LAX, Dec 15-22. Best options: Delta $384, American $412, JetBlue $445
Analyzing options based on your preferences (price priority, no red-eyes)...
Selected: Delta flights - Depart 8:45 AM, Return 2:15 PM
Booking initiated... Payment processed via stored card ending in 4567. Confirmation: DL-890234
‚úàÔ∏è Flight booked! NYC to LAX: Dec 15 at 8:45 AM, return Dec 22 at 2:15 PM. Total: $384. Boarding passes sent to your mobile wallet.

title: Grocery Order (Lite Agent)
description: AI agent places grocery order through integrated shopping platform

steps.content: Order groceries for this week's meal plan - chicken, vegetables, pasta, and the usual staples
Accessing your meal plan and shopping history...
Connecting to Instacart API for local availability...
Instacart: Whole Foods available for 2-hour delivery. Building cart based on meal plan...
Adding: 2lb organic chicken breast, mixed vegetables, whole grain pasta, milk, eggs, bread, apples...
Cart total: $89.43 (15 items). Delivery fee: $3.99. Estimated delivery: 2:30 PM today
Order confirmed with regular payment method
üõí Grocery order placed! $93.42 total, 15 items from Whole Foods. Delivery expected by 2:30 PM. Shopper will text updates.

title: Car Service Appointment (Lite Agent)
description: AI agent books car maintenance using dealership's service system

steps.content: My car is due for its 30,000 mile service. Book it with Honda dealership for next week
Looking up vehicle service history...
Connecting to Honda Service Connect portal...
Honda Service: Vehicle 2019 Accord (VIN: 1HG***789) due for 30K service. Available slots: Tue 9 AM, Wed 1 PM, Thu 8 AM
30K service includes: oil change, tire rotation, brake inspection, fluid checks
Booking Tuesday 9 AM slot (estimated 2-3 hours)
Service appointment confirmed: Tuesday 9 AM, 30,000-mile maintenance. Estimated cost: $280-320. Bring keys and registration.
üîß Service booked! Honda 30K maintenance - Tuesday at 9 AM. Est. 2-3 hours, $280-320. I'll remind you to bring keys and registration.
